document_data.name: Cyrdemac
document_data.mainbody: '''Cyrdemac''' was a particularly unscrupulous man who lived in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was an unethical man, willing to manipulate others for his own gain.
document_data.Possessions: Among Cyrdemac's possessions was an ''+1 [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[bastard sword]]''.
document_data.Activities: Cyrdemac was a regular patron of the [[Elfsong]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1368}}, Cyrdemac became aware that the noblewoman [[Areana (person)|Areana]] was having an extra-marital affair  in the city's [[Undercellar]]. He began to blackmail the noblewoman, to the amount of hundreds of [[gp|gold pieces]].
